Getting Started with PowerBI

Optional Materials and Reading

  1. PowerBI Walkthrough 1 – Google Doc (be sure you’re using your @illinois.edu account) OR PDF version (click on “More Pages” at bottom to see more) & MediaSpace Video (be sure you have created and are signed into your MediaSpace account)
  2. Microsoft’s PowerBI overview
  3. Microsoft’s Getting Started with PowerBI
  4. Microsoft’s PowerBI training

Data

Corgis per country over time

This dataset is from the Cardigan Archives and scraped using Beautiful Soup in Python and further processed in Python into this form.
